name: ProBlend 77
description: ProBlend 77 from SWT group is a specially formulated bitumen-based high solids rust preventative which will provide years of underbody corrosion protection for all types of vehicles in any environment. This latest offering from SWT Groupsâ€™ wide range of rust preventive products provides the additional benefit of superior chip resistance while minimizing road and powertrain noise incursion to the vehicle passenger compartment. ProBlend 77 exhibits superior durability against road salts and most automotive chemicals while standing up well to power washer spray and extreme weather conditions.
